services.name: Paradise Lodge
services.description: Perched on the ridge between the two lakes with panoramic views of Nech Sar. The oldest and most established lodge in Arba Minch.

services.name: Haile Resort Arba Minch
services.description: Contemporary lakeside resort with manicured gardens descending toward Lake Chamo. Conference facilities and a modern restaurant.

services.name: Dorze Lodge
services.description: Highland eco-lodge offering traditional Dorze bamboo huts with modern amenities. Cultural immersion at 2,600 metres.

services.name: Rift Valley Trekking
services.description: Licensed guides specializing in multi-day treks through Nech Sar, the Dorze highlands, and the Omo Valley corridor.

services.name: Gamo Cultural Encounters
services.description: Community-led tours of Dorze weaving workshops, traditional markets, and homestead visits with Gamo families.

services.name: Chamo Boat Services
services.description: Morning boat excursions to the Crocodile Market and hippo territories on Lake Chamo. Departures from Lante dock.

services.name: Selam Bus
services.description: Reliable long-distance coach service connecting Arba Minch to Addis Ababa and Hawassa. Book in advance during peak season.

services.name: Local Minibus Network
services.description: Frequent minibus connections between Sikela, Shecha, and surrounding towns including Chencha and Dorze.

events.name: Meskel Festival
events.description: The Finding of the True Cross celebrated with massive bonfires, processions, and communal feasting across the city.

events.name: Timkat
events.description: Ethiopian Epiphany. Processions carry tabot replicas to the lakeside, accompanied by chanting, drumming, and communal baptism.

events.name: Gamo New Year (Mesqela)
events.description: The Gamo people's own new year celebration, featuring traditional dances, bull-jumping ceremonies, and elder blessings.
